thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 11 of 110
thread.title: rroman747

author: rroman747
title: rroman747
text: I have a 9 year old who kept asking for help, lunch, snack, a million other stuff. I kept having to stop, I had an unexpected visitor I had to stop again. it should have been 4-6 hours it rolled over because of the interruptions. I loved the fact that I can stop save, make a cup of coffee, log back on and start where I left off on. The voice recording and identifier was a bit annoying but completely necessary and understandable. It makes it easier for mothers who need to take care of the home and kids. Next time I will wait for my day off, when my son is in school. I had a wonderful experience.
